mapper.insert: REPLACE ks_km_health_check_result (dimension, config_name, cluster_phy_id, res_name, passed) VALUES (#{dimension}, #{configName}, #{clusterPhyId}, #{resName}, #{passed})

insert into ks_km_health_check_result (dimension, config_name, cluster_phy_id, res_name, passed) values
(#{item.dimension}, #{item.configName}, #{item.clusterPhyId}, #{item.resName}, #{item.passed})
on duplicate key update dimension = dimension, config_name = config_name, cluster_phy_id = cluster_phy_id, res_name = res_name, passed = passed
